effect.red-blue: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.yellow: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.red-green-japan: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.
effect.blue-japan: Inflicts regular damage. If the target is under the effect of bounce, fly, or sky drop, this move will hit with double power.

short_effect.red-blue: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.yellow: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.red-green-japan: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
short_effect.blue-japan: Inflicts regular damage and can hit Pokémon in the air.
